scripts.build: nitro build && npx prisma generate --schema=./prisma/schema.prisma && npx prisma migrate deploy --schema=./prisma/schema.prisma
scripts.preview: npx prisma generate --schema=./prisma/schema.prisma && npx prisma migrate deploy --schema=./prisma/schema.prisma && node -r dotenv/config .output/server/index.mjs
